product_name: San Gabriel Mountains Recreation Topo Map - Western Section
long_description: Double-sided topo map and information guide to the San Gabriel Mountains western section, including Angleles National Forest and the Verdugo Mountains. Covers mountain biking, hiking, camping and four-wheel drive trails with elevation profiles, trail descriptions and shaded relief. Double lamination. Opens to 36" x 24"; scale of 1:62,500. Fine Edge Productions; Copyright 2001.
short_description: Double-sided topo map and information guide to the San Gabriel Mountains western section, including Angleles National Forest and the Verdugo Mountains.
